short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It allows you to easily control the translation properties of web pages and control whether web pages can be translated.
short.zh_CN: 可以让你轻松控制网页的翻译属性，控制网页是否能够被翻译

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you visit some web pages in a language other than your own language, you cannot read and understand it normally, and the language translation using Google pages is invalid. This plug-in can effectively solve this problem to achieve the translation of any web page. After the function is turned on, use the right button of the mouse to select "Translate to Chinese" to translate the page to solve your dyslexia.
long.zh_CN: 当你访问部分非本国语言的网页时，无法正常阅读并理解，使用谷歌页面的语言翻译无效，通过此插件可以有效解决这个问题，以实现任意网页的翻译。功能开启后使用鼠标右键选择“翻译成中文”，即可实现页面的翻译，以解决你的阅读障碍。
